class.name: slamdunk_nodelets/PclXYZRGBConcatNodelet
class.description: Merge consecutive XYZRGB PointClouds into one single PointCloud

class.name: slamdunk_nodelets/PclXYZRGBRecordNodelet
class.description: Save a pcl sequence in a given folder

class.name: slamdunk_nodelets/KeyframePublisherNodelet
class.description: Republish frames that are tagged as KeyFrame

class.name: slamdunk_nodelets/GoodframePublisherNodelet
class.description: Republish frames that are associated with a good slam quality indicator
